attributes.action: Stop journalists misgendering people from the transgender community
attributes.additional_details: Furthermore when this occurs it is discrimination against a minority group and further segregates a vulnerable minority group.
attributes.background:
Journalists routinely deadname and misgender people from the transgender community.
The IPSO should be allowed to sanction a financial penalty when this occurs as it is breaching confidentiality and are also breaching the equality act.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of IPSO, which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament. 

You can find more about the IPSO Code and how it is drawn up here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/editors-code-of-practice/

If you wish to make a complaint under the Code you can do so here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/complain/
